EPSEVSLDamping

the damping type used in the EVSL solver

Synopsis

typedef enum { EPS_EVSL_DAMPING_NONE,
               EPS_EVSL_DAMPING_JACKSON,
               EPS_EVSL_DAMPING_SIGMA } EPSEVSLDamping;

See Also

EPSEVSLSetDOSParameters(), EPSEVSLGetDOSParameters()
